list.abstract: water（英[ˈwɔːtə]，美[ˈwɔːtər]），英语单词，作名词用，为水；大片的水；水体。作动词用，为泪汪汪；充满泪水；掺水冲淡。短语搭配有drinking water（饮用水），例句为“You have to fight your way into the carriage, and keep away from others' hot water.（你必须拼命挤进车厢，远离别人的热水。）” water名词类近义词有seawater、eau，不及物动词类近义词有shed tears、pipe one's eye，复数形式为waters，过去分词为watered。
《water》是英国电子流行乐组合hurts演唱的一首英文歌曲，收录在hurts2010年发行的英文专辑《happiness》中。

yingyinNormal.en: Daddy Pig is drinking from the water fountain. Water.
yingyinNormal.zh: 猪爸爸正在和喷泉里的水。水！

yingyinNormal.en: Reinforcing my "water has memory" theory. Mm. Water has memory.
yingyinNormal.zh: 再次证明了我说的水有记忆的理论。水有记忆。

yingyinNormal.en: Thank goodness water has memory.
yingyinNormal.zh: 幸亏水有记忆。

yingyinNormal.en: So, I'm got to make a lot more water.
yingyinNormal.zh: 所以，我得造出来更多水才行。

yingyinNormal.en: And water vapor, which came from the galaxy.
yingyinNormal.zh: 还有来自外星系的水蒸气。

yingyinNormal.en: Yeah, a lot of people think I'm a water sign.
yingyinNormal.zh: 是，很多人会以为我是水相星座的。

yingyinNormal.en: Well, then, you're letting the water make you its prey.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这么说，你是水的猎物罗。

yingyinNormal.en: Bring a bottle of water on stage if you're allowed.
yingyinNormal.zh: 如果可以的话，带一瓶水上台。
yingyinNormal.videoNameZh: 《公开场合演讲如何展现自信？》

yingyinNormal.en: Everything's destroyed. There's no food, no water.
yingyinNormal.zh: 所有的一切都毁了没有食物、没有水。

yingyinNormal.en: Made with rose water and cumin. That means "Thank you."
yingyinNormal.zh: 用玫瑰水和小茴香制成的，意思是"谢谢"。

yingyinNormal.en: Alright, you old sea-dog, race you! Prepare to lose, water-hog!
yingyinNormal.zh: 好吧，那我就来和你这个海狗比一场吧！准备好输吧，你这水猪。

yingyinNormal.en: Daddy, is the water cold? A little bit.
yingyinNormal.zh: 爸爸，水冷吗？有一点。

yingyinNormal.en: The Earth became a world of salty water.
yingyinNormal.zh: 地球成了被盐水覆盖的世界。

yingyinNormal.en: Is the water cold? It's lovely and warm!
yingyinNormal.zh: 海水冷不冷呀？暖暖的，很舒服！

yingyinNormal.en: We couldn't find any signs of fresh water.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我们目前还找不到水源。

yingyinNormal.en: Can I get you some water? I'm good. I'm good.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你要喝水吗？我没事。

yingyinNormal.en: You mean that thing is under water? Yes. Yes.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你是说那东西在水下？是的。是的。

yingyinNormal.en: Yeah, there was nothing. Can I get some water?
yingyinNormal.zh: 是的，什么都没有，我能喝点水吗？

yingyinNormal.en: May I buy you a beverage? Tepid water, please.
yingyinNormal.zh: 能请你喝杯饮料吗？温水，谢谢。

yingyinNormal.en: Well, the hydro rigs are taking all the water.
yingyinNormal.zh: 水能塔会把所有海水都吸走。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 分水岭；转折点；重要关头；流域；开始播放儿童不宜电视节目的时间
adj. 防水的；不透水的；耐水的

word_family.mean: n. 水；大片的水；水体；水域；水色；清水股；虚股；水中；供水；海水

examination_example.sentence: Humans overwhelmingly live in valleys, and on supplies of fresh <highlight>water</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 人类绝大多数生活在山谷中，依靠淡水供应为生。

examination_example.sentence: Parts of the ceremony involve ritual hair cutting, tying cotton threads soaked in holy <highlight>water</highlight> around the bride's and groom's wrists.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 婚礼的一部分包括剪发仪式，将浸过圣水的棉线系在新郎和新娘的手腕上。

exam_freq_info.chinese: (too much water drowned the miller)过犹不及

word_level_phrase_info.phrase: too much water drowned the miller

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

examination_example.sentence: Apart from the fire, the <highlight>water</highlight> used to extinguish it also caused a lot of damage to Notre Dame Cathedral.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 除了大火，用来灭火的水也对巴黎圣母院造成了很大的破坏。

examination_example.sentence: Ash covered the marble diamond-patterned floor and floated in large pools of grey <highlight>water</highlight> from the fire hoses.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 大理石钻石图案的地板上满是灰烬，从消防水管流出来的灰色水塘里漂浮着灰烬。

sense_info_list.zh: (too much water drowned the miller)过犹不及

examination_example.sentence: As the saying goes, too much <highlight>water</highlight> drowned the miller.

word_usage.usage:
water表示“水”，通常是不可数名词，但是在表示“(海/江/湖等大片)水域”时， water常用复数形式， 此时常与定冠词the连用。
示例：The waters are clear and offer a superb opportunity for swimming. 
这片水域水质清澈，是游泳的绝佳场所。

examination_example.sentence: After contacting the chocolate manufacturer, the firefighters resorted to spraying hot, pressurized <highlight>water</highlight> to get rid of the sticky substance.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在联系巧克力制造商后，消防队员们采取了喷射热水、加压水的方法来去除粘性物质。

examination_example.sentence: But <highlight>water</highlight> shortages are even more worrying in India.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 但印度的水资源短缺问题更令人担忧。

examination_example.sentence: Millions of irrigation wells have significantly lowered <highlight>water</highlight> tables in almost every state.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 数百万口灌溉井大大降低了几乎每个州的地下水位。

examination_example.sentence: Try to make the hole in a damp area to increase the <highlight>water</highlight> catcher's productivity.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 试着在潮湿的地方挖一个洞，以增加集水器的生产力。

examination_example.sentence: They often get up early and <highlight>water</highlight> the vegetables together.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他们经常早起一起给蔬菜浇水。

examination_example.sentence: Many of the images were stored in an ice chest, under freezing <highlight>water</highlight>, in the damaged wooden ship.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 许多照片被保存在冰水中一艘破损木船的冰柜里。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

examination_example.sentence: We should leave clean <highlight>water</highlight> and green mountains to our next generations (一代人).
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我们应该给我们的下一代留下绿水青山。

examination_example.sentence: Staying close to a river was easy to get <highlight>water</highlight> for living.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 住在河边很容易获得生活用水。

examination_example.sentence: Our drinking <highlight>water</highlight> is becoming dirtier, and the air is not as clean as before.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我们的饮用水越来越脏，空气也不像以前那么干净了。
